price: 41. Tokkel nabiyow ken (makki koros kinnuk) digaallák naharal akeera fan koo tatrusne nee tekkekii, toysa diggah cane keenil gacsennooh ken digaalenno akceral.
arabic: فَإِمَّا نَذۡهَبَنَّ بِكَ فَإِنَّا مِنۡهُم مُّنتَقِمُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-immā nadhhabanna bika fa-innā min'hum muntaqimūna
